snippet: Air Force tanker planes were ready to fly firefighting sorties from Peterson Air Force Base in Colorado Springs on Tuesday after a deadly weekend crash grounded the tankers.
abstract: Air Force tanker planes are ready to resume firefighting sorties from Peterson Air Force Base in Colorado Springs after a deadly crash grounded the tankers.
lead_paragraph: Air Force tanker planes were ready to fly firefighting sorties from Peterson Air Force Base in Colorado Springs on Tuesday after a deadly weekend crash grounded the tankers.

headline.main: Colorado: Tanker Planes Cleared for Fire Duty
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Tanker Planes Cleared For Fire Duty
